title: I am looking for the doctor/clinic/phone number ad that appeared in a full page ad in your paper within the last two weeks regarding Zerona Laser Lipsuction.  I\'ve been online and can\'t find any reference to it.  Can you help?
text: Hello. Here's the phone number and information you requested: The ad appeared on Page 5A of the Sunday, Aug. 8, 2010, edition of the StarNews. The ad was placed by Advance Spa Therapy. (910) 392-5851.
